channel.title: Accepted on Raghav Khanna
channel.description: Recent content in Accepted on Raghav Khanna

item.title: Autonomous Electric Race Car Design
item.description: Autonomous driving and electric vehicles are nowadays very active research and development areas. In this paper we present the conversion of a standard Kyburz eRod into an autonomous vehicle that can be operated in challenging environments such as Swiss mountain passes. The overall hardware and software architectures are described in detail with a special emphasis on the sensor requirements for autonomous vehicles operating in partially structured environments. Furthermore, the design process itself and the finalized system architecture are presented.
